column4: when trying modprobe ndiswrapper I get "FATAL: error inserting ndiswrapper: invalid argument". This is just after I had run upgrades on the system, it worked before. ideas?
avoid ndiswrapper :) you can buy cheap wireless miniPCI cards on ebay.
does your wireless card have native drivers?
there are likely also free wireless 802.11B cards on www.freecycle.org.
